# @miozu/jera — Full API Reference

> Zero-dependency, AI-first component library for Svelte 5. 85 components, Base16 design tokens, pure modern CSS.

---

## Primitives

### Button

Primary action trigger. Polymorphic — renders as `<a>` when `href` is provided, `<button>` otherwise.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| variant | 'primary' \| 'secondary' \| 'outline' \| 'ghost' \| 'success' \| 'danger' \| 'warning' \| 'info' | 'primary' | Visual style |
| size | 'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| disabled | boolean | false | Prevents interaction |
| loading | boolean | false | Shows spinner, disables button |
| fullWidth | boolean | false | Stretches to container width |
| href | string | undefined | Renders as link when provided |
| type | string | 'button' | HTML button type |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children`
Events: `onclick`, `...restProps`

```svelte
<Button variant="primary">Create</Button>
<Button variant="danger" size="sm" loading>Deleting...</Button>
<Button href="/about" variant="ghost">About</Button>
```

---

### Badge

Status tag with semantic color variants.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| variant | 'default' \| 'primary' \| 'secondary' \| 'success' \| 'warning' \| 'error' \| 'info' | 'default' | Color scheme |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| clickable | boolean | false | Enables hover/click styles |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children`, `iconLeft`, `iconRight`
Events: `onclick`

```svelte
<Badge variant="success">Active</Badge>
<Badge variant="error" size="sm">3 errors</Badge>
```

---

### StatusBadge

Predefined status indicator with 15 semantic variants. Falls back to rendering the variant name as text if no children provided.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| variant | 'default' \| 'pending' \| 'approved' \| 'success' \| 'connected' \| 'rejected' \| 'error' \| 'disconnected' \| 'owner' \| 'primary' \| 'public' \| 'admin' \| 'member' \| 'private' \| 'info' | 'default' | Status type |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children`

```svelte
<StatusBadge variant="connected" />  <!-- Renders "Connected" -->
<StatusBadge variant="error">Offline</StatusBadge>
```

---

### Divider

Visual separator, horizontal or vertical.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| orientation | 'horizontal' \| 'vertical' | 'horizontal' | Direction |
| thickness | string | '1px' | Line width |
| spacing | string | '1rem' | Margin around divider |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children` (optional label text centered on the line)

```svelte
<Divider />
<Divider>OR</Divider>
<Divider orientation="vertical" />
```

---

### Avatar

User avatar with image, initials fallback, and optional status indicator.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| src | string | '' | Image URL |
| alt | string | '' | Alt text |
| name | string | '' | Used for initials fallback |
| size | 'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' \| 'xl' \| '2xl' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| status | null \| 'online' \| 'offline' \| 'busy' \| 'away' | null | Status dot |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

```svelte
<Avatar src="/photo.jpg" name="John Doe" size="lg" status="online" />
<Avatar name="JD" />  <!-- Shows initials -->
```

---

### Stat

Metric display with optional progress bar.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| value | string \| number | required | Main value |
| label | string | required | Description |
| unit | string | '' | Unit suffix |
| secondary | string | '' | Secondary info |
| status | '' \| 'success' \| 'warning' \| 'error' \| 'info' | '' | Color accent |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| showBar | boolean | false | Show progress bar |
| barValue | number | 0 | Progress value (0-max) |
| max | number | 100 | Progress max |
| href | string | '' | Makes stat clickable |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children`

---

### ThemeToggle

Animated sun/moon button for dark/light theme switching.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| themeState | ThemeState | singleton | Theme state instance |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| variant | 'ghost' \| 'outline' \| 'subtle' | 'ghost' | Button style |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `sunIcon`, `moonIcon`, `label`

---

### ThemeSelect

Three-option theme selector (light/dark/system).

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| themeState | ThemeState | singleton | Theme state instance |
| variant | 'segmented' \| 'dropdown' | 'segmented' | Selector style |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| labels | object | { light: 'Light', dark: 'Dark', system: 'System' } | Button labels |
| showIcons | boolean | true | Show mode icons |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

---

## Forms

### Input

Text input with validation and error states.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| value | string | $bindable('') | Input value (two-way) |
| ref | HTMLElement | $bindable() | DOM element reference |
| type | string | 'text' | Input type |
| placeholder | string | '' | Placeholder text |
| disabled | boolean | false | Disabled state |
| required | boolean | false | Required field |
| name | string | '' | Form field name |
| id | string | '' | Element ID |
| error | boolean | false | Error border state |
| unstyled | boolean | false | Remove all jera styling |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Events: `oninput`, `onchange`, `onkeydown`, `onfocus`, `onblur`, `...rest`

```svelte
<Input bind:value={name} placeholder="Enter name" required />
<Input type="email" error={!isValid} />
```

---

### Textarea

Multiline text input with optional auto-resize.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| value | string | $bindable('') | Text value (two-way) |
| ref | HTMLElement | $bindable() | DOM element reference |
| placeholder | string | '' | Placeholder text |
| disabled | boolean | false | Disabled state |
| required | boolean | false | Required field |
| rows | number | 3 | Visible rows |
| autoResize | boolean | false | Auto-grow with content |
| error | boolean | false | Error border state |
| unstyled | boolean | false | Remove all jera styling |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Events: `oninput`, `onchange`, `onkeydown`, `onfocus`, `onblur`, `...rest`

---

### Select

Custom dropdown with keyboard navigation.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| options | array | [] | Array of {value, label} or custom shape |
| value | any | $bindable(null) | Selected value (two-way) |
| placeholder | string | 'Select...' | Placeholder text |
| labelKey | string | 'label' | Key for display text |
| valueKey | string | 'value' | Key for option value |
| size | 'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| disabled | boolean | false | Disabled state |
| error | boolean | false | Error border state |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Events: `onchange(option)` — receives the full option object

```svelte
<Select
  options={[{value: 'a', label: 'Option A'}, {value: 'b', label: 'Option B'}]}
  bind:value={selected}
  placeholder="Choose..."
/>
```

---

### Checkbox

Checkbox with label via children snippet.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| checked | boolean | $bindable(false) | Checked state (two-way) |
| disabled | boolean | false | Disabled state |
| required | boolean | false | Required field |
| error | boolean | false | Error state |
| name | string | '' | Form field name |
| id | string | auto-generated | Element ID |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children` (label text)
Events: `onchange`, `...rest`

```svelte
<Checkbox bind:checked={agreed}>I agree to the terms</Checkbox>
```

---

### Switch

Toggle switch for boolean settings.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| checked | boolean | $bindable(false) | Toggle state (two-way) |
| disabled | boolean | false | Disabled state |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| name | string | '' | Form field name |
| id | string | auto-generated | Element ID |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children` (label text)
Events: `onchange`, `...rest`

---

### SearchInput

Search field with icon, clear button, and loading state.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| value | string | $bindable('') | Search value (two-way) |
| placeholder | string | 'Search...' | Placeholder text |
| disabled | boolean | false | Disabled state |
| loading | boolean | false | Shows spinner |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Events: `oninput`, `onchange`, `onclear`, `...rest`

---

## Feedback

### Toast

Notification system. Uses Svelte context for app-wide access.

**Setup:**
```svelte
<!-- +layout.svelte -->
<script>
  import { Toast, createToastContext } from '@miozu/jera';
  const toast = createToastContext();
</script>
<Toast />

<!-- Any child component -->
<script>
  import { getToastContext } from '@miozu/jera';
  const toast = getToastContext();
  toast.success('Saved!');
  toast.error('Failed', { duration: 6000 });
</script>
```

**Controller API:**
- `toast.info(message, opts?)` — Info notification
- `toast.success(message, opts?)` — Success notification
- `toast.warning(message, opts?)` — Warning notification
- `toast.error(message, opts?)` — Error notification
- `toast.show({type, message, title?, duration?})` — Custom notification
- `toast.dismiss(id)` — Dismiss specific toast
- `toast.dismissAll()` — Dismiss all

**Controller Properties:**
- `toast.position` — 'bottom-right' | 'bottom-left' | 'bottom-center' | 'top-right' | 'top-left' | 'top-center'
- `toast.defaultDuration` — number (default: 4000ms)
- `toast.maxToasts` — number (default: 5)

---

### Alert

Inline alert with icon and optional actions.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| variant | 'info' \| 'success' \| 'warning' \| 'error' | 'info' | Color scheme |
| title | string | '' | Alert heading |
| dismissible | boolean | false | Show close button |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children` (message body), `icon`, `actions`
Events: `onclose`

```svelte
<Alert variant="warning" title="Rate Limited" dismissible>
  You've hit the API rate limit. Please wait.
  {#snippet actions()}
    <Button variant="ghost" size="sm">Retry</Button>
  {/snippet}
</Alert>
```

---

### Spinner

Loading indicator.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| size | 'xs' \| 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' \| 'xl' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| color | string | 'currentColor' | Spinner color |
| label | string | 'Loading...' | Accessibility label |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

---

### EmptyState

Placeholder for empty data states.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| title | string | 'No data found' | Heading |
| description | string | '' | Subtext |
| size | 'default' \| 'compact' \| 'large' | 'default' | Dimensions |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `icon`, `actions`

```svelte
<EmptyState title="No products" description="Connect your Shopify store to sync products.">
  {#snippet actions()}
    <Button variant="primary">Connect Store</Button>
  {/snippet}
</EmptyState>
```

---

### Skeleton

Loading placeholder shapes.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| variant | 'text' \| 'heading' \| 'circle' \| 'rect' | 'text' | Shape |
| width | string | '100%' | Width |
| height | string | null | Height |
| size | number | null | Circle diameter |
| lines | number | 1 | Number of text lines |
| animate | boolean | true | Pulse animation |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

---

### ProgressBar

Progress indicator, determinate or indeterminate.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| value | number | 0 | Current progress |
| max | number | 100 | Maximum value |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Bar height |
| variant | 'primary' \| 'success' \| 'warning' \| 'error' \| 'info' | 'primary' | Color scheme |
| showLabel | boolean | false | Show percentage text |
| label | string | null | Custom label text |
| indeterminate | boolean | false | Infinite animation |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

---

## Overlays

### Modal

Dialog overlay with variants and fill mode.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| open | boolean | $bindable(false) | Visibility (two-way) |
| title | string | '' | Dialog heading |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' \| 'xl' \| 'full' | 'md' | Width |
| variant | 'default' \| 'danger' \| 'warning' \| 'success' \| 'info' | 'default' | Color accent |
| closeOnBackdrop | boolean | true | Close on backdrop click |
| closeOnEscape | boolean | true | Close on Esc key |
| showClose | boolean | true | Show X button |
| fill | boolean | false | Pin to 80dvh, body scrolls internally |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children` (body), `footer`, `icon`
Events: `onclose`

```svelte
<Modal bind:open={showDialog} title="Confirm Delete" variant="danger">
  <p>This action cannot be undone.</p>
  {#snippet footer()}
    <Button variant="ghost" onclick={() => showDialog = false}>Cancel</Button>
    <Button variant="danger" onclick={handleDelete}>Delete</Button>
  {/snippet}
</Modal>
```

---

### Popover

Hover/click popover with CSS Anchor Positioning and JS fallback.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| content | string | '' | Tooltip text |
| position | 'top' \| 'bottom' \| 'left' \| 'right' | 'top' | Preferred position |
| delay | object | { show: 100, hide: 100 } | Show/hide delay in ms |
| offset | number | 8 | Distance from trigger |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children` (trigger element), `content` (rich content, overrides string prop)

---

### ConfirmDialog

Pre-built confirmation modal.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| open | boolean | $bindable(false) | Visibility (two-way) |
| title | string | 'Confirm Action' | Dialog heading |
| message | string | 'Are you sure you want to proceed?' | Body text |
| confirmText | string | 'Confirm' | Confirm button label |
| cancelText | string | 'Cancel' | Cancel button label |
| variant | 'danger' \| 'warning' \| 'success' \| 'info' | 'danger' | Color scheme |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `icon`
Events: `onconfirm`, `oncancel`

---

## Navigation

### Tabs

Tab navigation with animated sliding indicator.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| tabs | array | [] | Array of {id, label?, badge?, icon?, panelId?, disabled?} |
| active | string | $bindable(null) | Active tab ID (two-way) |
| variant | 'default' \| 'segment' \| 'underline' \| 'pills' | 'default' | Visual style |
| size | 'sm' \| 'md' \| 'lg' | 'md' | Dimensions |
| fullWidth | boolean | false | Stretch tabs to fill |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Events: `onchange(tab)` — receives the full tab object

```svelte
<Tabs
  tabs={[{id: 'overview', label: 'Overview'}, {id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', badge: 3}]}
  bind:active={currentTab}
  variant="segment"
/>
```

---

### Accordion

Collapsible content sections.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| expanded | array | $bindable([]) | Array of expanded item IDs |
| multiple | boolean | false | Allow multiple items open |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children` (AccordionItem components)

### AccordionItem

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| id | string | auto-generated | Unique identifier |
| title | string | '' | Header text |
| expanded | boolean | $bindable(false) | Open state (standalone mode) |
| disabled | boolean | false | Prevents toggle |
| badge | string \| number | null | Badge next to title |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children` (content), `leading`, `trailing`, `indicator(isOpen)`

---

### NavBar

Horizontal navigation bar with mega-menu sections.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| brand | object | {label: 'Home', description: '', breadcrumbs: []} | Brand/logo area |
| sections | array | [] | Array of {id, label, badge?, items: [{title, href, desc, icon?}]} |
| subnavItems | array | [] | Secondary nav items {id, label, href, badge?, icon?} |
| activeSubnav | string | null | Active subnav item ID |
| sticky | boolean | false | Stick to top on scroll |
| isActive | function | () => false | Route matching function |

Snippets: `actions`, `center`, `subnav`, `renderIcon(name, size)`

---

### LeftBar

Collapsible sidebar container providing context to children.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| collapsed | boolean | $bindable(false) | Collapsed state (two-way) |
| initialCollapsed | boolean | undefined | SSR hydration value |
| persistKey | string | null | localStorage persistence key |
| cookieKey | string | null | Cookie persistence key |
| popoverMap | object | {} | Label -> items map for collapsed popovers |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `header`, `navigation`, `footer`, `children`

Context provided: `{ collapsed, toggle(), expand(), collapse(), showPopover(), hidePopover(), keepPopoverOpen() }`

```svelte
<LeftBar bind:collapsed persistKey="sidebar">
  {#snippet header()}
    <DropdownContainer user={data.user} {themeState} />
  {/snippet}
  {#snippet navigation()}
    <LeftBarSection title="Main">
      <LeftBarItem href="/" icon={Home} label="Dashboard" active />
    </LeftBarSection>
  {/snippet}
  {#snippet footer()}
    <LeftBarToggle />
  {/snippet}
</LeftBar>
```

---

### LeftBarSection

Grouped navigation section within LeftBar.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| title | string | '' | Section heading (hidden when collapsed) |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children`

---

### LeftBarItem

Navigation item with optional subroutes.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| href | string | null | Navigation URL |
| label | string | '' | Display text |
| icon | Component | null | Svelte component with `size` prop |
| active | boolean | false | Highlight state |
| expandable | boolean | false | Has expandable subroutes |
| expanded | boolean | $bindable(false) | Subroutes visible |
| subroutes | array | [] | Array of {label, href} |
| badge | string \| number | null | Badge text/count |
| variant | 'default' \| 'warning' \| 'danger' \| 'success' | 'default' | Color accent |
| onclick | function | null | Click handler |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `leading`, `trailing`, `children`

---

### LeftBarGroup

Dynamic item group with search, avatar support, and add button.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| title | string | '' | Group heading |
| items | array | [] | Data items |
| expanded | boolean | $bindable(false) | Group expanded |
| searchable | boolean | false | Show search filter |
| showAdd | boolean | true | Show add button |
| showCount | boolean | true | Show item count |
| addLabel | string | 'Add item' | Add button label |

Accessor functions: `getItemId`, `getItemName`, `getItemAvatar`, `getItemInitial`, `getItemPlatform`, `getSubroutes`, `isItemActive`, `isSubrouteActive`
Events: `onItemClick`, `onSubrouteClick`, `onAddClick`
Snippets: `item(item, isExpanded)`, `children`

---

### LeftBarToggle

Sidebar collapse toggle button. Reads LeftBar context automatically.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

---

### DropdownContainer

User account menu for sidebar headers.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| user | object | null | {full_name, avatar_url, role_name} |
| title | string | '' | Optional title override |
| isCollapsed | boolean | false | Sidebar collapsed state |
| themeState | ThemeState | null | Theme state for toggle |
| signOutLoading | boolean | false | Sign out loading state |
| signOutAction | string | '/auth?/signout' | Sign out form action |
| onSignOut | function | null | Sign out callback |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `userHeader`, `envSection`, `menuItems`, `footerContent`, `children`

---

## Layout

### PageHeader

Flexible page header with stats and action slots.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| title | string | '' | Page title |
| description | string | '' | Subtitle |
| stats | array | [] | Array of {label, value, variant?, icon?} |
| size | 'default' \| 'compact' \| 'large' | 'default' | Dimensions |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `icon`, `actions`, `search`, `filters`

---

### SettingCard

Settings group container.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| title | string | '' | Card heading |
| variant | 'default' \| 'danger' | 'default' | Style |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `children`

---

### SettingItem

Individual setting row.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| label | string | '' | Setting name |
| description | string | '' | Help text |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `leading`, `action`

---

### BottomPanel

Slide-up panel with drag-to-resize.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| open | boolean | $bindable(false) | Visibility (two-way) |
| minimized | boolean | $bindable(false) | Minimized state (two-way) |
| height | number | $bindable(280) | Panel height in px (two-way) |
| minHeight | number | 120 | Minimum drag height |
| maxHeight | number | viewport - 120 | Maximum drag height |
| minimizedHeight | number | 28 | Height when minimized |
| offsetLeft | number | 0 | Left offset (for sidebar) |
| resizable | boolean | true | Enable drag-to-resize |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

Snippets: `header` (always visible), `sidebar` (optional left column), `children` (main content)
Events: `onresize(height)`

---

## Docs

### CodeBlock

Syntax-highlighted code display with copy button.

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| code | string | '' | Code content |
| lang | string | 'javascript' | Language for highlighting |
| filename | string | '' | Optional filename header |
| showLineNumbers | boolean | false | Show line numbers |
| class | string | '' | Additional CSS classes |

---

## Ready Components (Built, Not Yet Active)

### IconInput
Input with left/right icon slots, loading spinner, clearable.
Props: `value = $bindable('')`, `type = 'text'`, `placeholder`, `disabled`, `size = 'md'`, `loading`, `clearable`, `class`
Snippets: `leftIcon`, `rightIcon`. Events: `oninput`, `onchange`, `onclear`

### NumberInput
Numeric input with increment/decrement buttons.
Props: `value = $bindable(0)`, `min = -Infinity`, `max = Infinity`, `step = 1`, `placeholder`, `disabled`, `size = 'md'`, `error`, `class`

### Radio
Radio button (must be inside RadioGroup context).
Props: `value` (required), `label`, `description`, `disabled`, `id`, `class`

### RadioGroup
Radio group container with vertical/horizontal layout.
Props: `value = $bindable(null)`, `name`, `disabled`, `orientation = 'vertical'`, `class`
Events: `onchange`

### FileUpload
File upload with drag-drop and validation.
Props: `accept = '*'`, `multiple`, `disabled`, `maxSize`, `label`, `hint`, `class`
Events: `onchange(files[])`, `onerror(errors[])`

### RangeSlider
Range input with labels and value display.
Props: `value = $bindable(50)`, `min = 0`, `max = 100`, `step = 1`, `label`, `disabled`, `showValues`, `formatValue`, `size = 'md'`, `class`

### PinInput
PIN/code entry with auto-advance and paste support.
Props: `value = $bindable('')`, `length = 4`, `masked`, `disabled`, `size = 'md'`, `class`
Events: `oncomplete(value)`

### Dropzone
Drag-and-drop file zone.
Props: `accept = '*/*'`, `placeholder`, `disabled`, `class`
Events: `ondrop(file)`

### Tooltip
Hover tooltip.
Props: `text`, `position = 'top'`, `delay = 50`, `disabled`, `class`
Snippets: `children` (trigger), `content` (rich tooltip)

### Dropdown / DropdownItem / DropdownDivider
Menu dropdown system. Dropdown wraps items, DropdownItem is each option, DropdownDivider separates groups.

### Card, Link, LinkCard, LazyImage, MetricCard, FilterChip, StatusLine, MemberCard, DashCard, DistributionBar
Primitive components built but not yet adopted by consumer projects. See source files for API.

### PropsTable, SplitPane, DocSection
Documentation helper components for component library documentation sites.

---

## Utilities

### getTheme()
SSR-safe theme singleton. Call once in root layout.
```javascript
import { getTheme } from '@miozu/jera';
const theme = getTheme();
onMount(() => { theme.sync(); theme.init(); });
theme.toggle();      // Switch dark/light
theme.set('system'); // Follow OS
theme.isDark;        // Reactive boolean
```

### cn(...args)
Class name concatenation with falsy filtering.
```javascript
import { cn } from '@miozu/jera';
cn('base', isActive && 'active', size === 'lg' && 'large')
// => "base active" (when isActive=true, size!='lg')
```

### cv(config)
Class variants for type-safe variant composition.
```javascript
import { cv } from '@miozu/jera';
const button = cv({
  base: 'btn',
  variants: { variant: { primary: 'btn-primary' }, size: { sm: 'btn-sm' } },
  defaults: { variant: 'primary', size: 'sm' }
});
button({ variant: 'primary' }) // => "btn btn-primary btn-sm"
```

### createActiveChecker(page)
Route matching utility for navigation items.

---

## Actions

```svelte
<div use:clickOutside={() => isOpen = false}>
<dialog use:focusTrap={{ enabled: isOpen }}>
<div use:portal={'body'}>
<div use:escapeKey={() => close()}>
```

| Action | Parameters | Description |
|--------|-----------|-------------|
| clickOutside | callback | Fires when click occurs outside element |
| focusTrap | { enabled } | Traps focus within element |
| escapeKey | callback | Fires on Escape key press |
| portal | target selector | Moves element to target in DOM |
